data.Name: Jeremy Zucker
data.Bio: Jeremy Zucker (born March 3, 1996) is an American singer-songwriter best known for his song "Comethru", which has accumulated over 200 million streams on Spotify, as well as "All the Kids Are Depressed". In 2015, his song titled "'Bout It", featuring Daniel James & Benjamin O, was met with some commercial success and garnered millions of streams across SoundCloud and Spotify. Zucker has cited Jon Bellion, Blackbear, Eden, Bon Iver and Wet as some of his musical influences. Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Jeremy Zucker presents MORE NOISE !!!!
data.Description: DOORS: 7:00 PM SHOW: 8:00 PM THIS SHOW IS: ALL AGES VIP upgrades are also available for this show and can be purchased via the Artist website. Please note: all VIP upgrades are sold separately and all guests must still purchase a GA ticket on our website in order to attend the show.
